html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-06761997-04-230,  ,  HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of CHARLES BÉLANGER, of Montreal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years and designation of CHARLES BÉLANGER as Vice-Chairman of the Canadian Radio- television and Telecommunicatons Commission to hold office during pleasure, effective May 12, 1997.
Attachments
precis:
Appointment of CHARLES BÉLANGER, of Montreal, Quebec, as a full-time
member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission,
to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years and
designation of CHARLES BÉLANGER as Vice-Chairman of the Canadian Radio-
television and Telecommunicatons Commission to hold office during
pleasure, effective May 12, 1997.
